::Hot Rod::

He did a back flip avoiding all but three of the shots. He looked around
confused. This Dragonfly was going for the kill here. So be it.
"You wanted a fight, well here it is!"
He hand retracts, revealing a saw. He jumps and flips towards Dragonfly.
He brings the saw down, trying to slick the neck joint, and the chest of
Dragonfly.
